body.name: HOTOR Car Trash Can with Lid - 2 Pack, Mini Essential Car Accessories for Interior, Leakproof Garbage Can with 30 Attached Trash Bags, Multipurpose Organizers and Storage for Car, Home, Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 34 mins
features: WIDE APPLICATION: With a compact size of 8.1*3.6*3.6 inch, HOTOR car trash bins can be used in many areas of vehicles, such as cup holders, car door pockets, and seat back pockets. You can also set them on the desktop at home or office as a trash can or an organizer.

EASY TO USE: With the flipping lids on HOTOR car storage organizers, you can easily put items or trash into them. Just push to open the lid and then it will close automatically. Moreover, the auto shut-off lid can effectively block odors, keeping the air fresh in the car. HOTOR car trash bins are one of the essential car gadgets for car owners.

30 ATTACHED TRASH BAGS: Each set of HOTOR trash cans for cars comes with 30 perfectly matching disposable trash bags. Even with a lot of waste, these durable bags are not easy to break. When the trash can is full, you can replace the used trash bag with a new bag in seconds.

GREAT DECORATIONS: HOTOR car trash bins are made of premium ABS material that is durable and sturdy for long-term use. Although the HOTOR car trash can with cute in size, it can still show your exquisite taste with its unique diamond-shaped design. HOTOR car trash cans are the perfect decor for cars, homes, and offices.

EASY TO CLEAN: Featuring waterproof material and a leakproof design, HOTOR car trash bins are suitable for wet waste. Besides, they are easy to clean with a smooth interior. When the trash can gets dirty, you can remove the lid, rinse the lid and body, and wipe them with dry towels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and perfect size
reviews.reviewText: I’m very pleased to the look and size. I had my doubts at the beginning. But the fit perfectly in the door of the car, not bulky but big enough to put all the papers and keep the car more organized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great gift
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my son, it comes with two which is nice because his girlfriend got one. She was even more excited to get it then he was, and he was thrilled! It fits nicely in the cup holder, it comes with the trash bags, and it compliments the car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use!
reviews.reviewText: I like this product because it helps me keep my car organized and trash-free. I placed these on the side door pocket and use them regularly to place small pieces of trash such as straw covers or receipts I no longer use. Great value for the price. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was because the lid conns off too easily. Sometimes it just pops off when I’m driving which can be an annoying but overall I like the ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, but small for large cup holders.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! However, I drive a Pathfinder so they loosely sit in cupholders and rattle around. I'll need to get something to fill around them. I wish these came in a larger size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Vehicles
reviews.reviewText: I love that these fit perfectly in the cup holder in my car doors so I don’t take up space in the regular cup holders. It’s just me so I don’t have much trash to throw away, but if I do happen to have passengers, they don’t need to worry about reaching into my backseat for the bin I have for bigger trash. They can throw small wrappers away right by their feet. The only con I have is I wish you could buy the specific bags the holders come with separately instead of a similar one that maybe or may not be the same size. Assembly is self explanatory and the hinge seems pretty reliable as long as you’re not too aggressive with filling it up too much. Very much worth the price as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small and weird-ish
reviews.reviewText: I saw this item in every youtuber/tiktok video so I decided to give it a shot. The item is cute and the black color seems pretty solid. The container has an opening for the trash and the top half comes off. The item comes with a roll of bags (smaller than your usual doggie bag) that fits the container but is a hassle to fit it and place the cover back on. After trying a few times, I ditched the bag. Item holds a good portion size, but definitely for the gum wrapper/straw wrapper/random trash size items. Fits nicely in the panel portion of the door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Minivan must have!
reviews.reviewText: Just got our first minivan and these trash cans are a total must-have. We didn't want anything to be in the walkways so I purchased these.- We have two different-sized cupholders and these were able to fit in both the big and small with no problem.- They came with clearish white bags, but you can also use dog bags as an insert- Haven't had any issues with the lid popping off, it fits snug- We keep one in the front and one in the back where the kids are. They can easily put wrappers in there.- They don't carry a ton of garbage, but just enough. Great for gum and wrappers. I am ok with that because I didn't want anything too big.- I would 100% get this as a gift to someone who owns a minivan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly in the side door pocket.
reviews.reviewText: 2024 Nissan Versa. These fit perfectly in the side door. Great for gum wrappers and smaller sized trash. It even includes some small trash bags.
